prompt: A professional studio photograph of a collection of antique hand mirrors from different eras (Victorian, Art Deco, Art Nouveau) arranged on a light-colored, slightly distressed wooden table. Composition should be balanced and aesthetically pleasing, showcasing the diversity of antique hand mirror designs. --ar 16:9

prompt: A dramatic, moody photograph of an antique hand mirror lying on a dusty, aged dressing table in a dimly lit attic. The mirror's glass is cracked and reflects a distorted image of the surrounding room. Dust motes are visible in the air, illuminated by a single ray of sunlight filtering through a crack in the boarded-up window. The color palette is muted and desaturated, with a focus on browns, grays, and blacks. The image evokes a sense of history and forgotten beauty. --ar 16:9

prompt: High-resolution image showcasing the process of restoring an antique hand mirror. The background is a clean, well-lit workshop environment. The image focuses on the craftsmanship and attention to detail involved in antique restoration. --ar 16:9
